members.name: calendar-weeks-ui
members.doc: Creates a visual theme for the calendar weeks view.

params.name: $ui
params.doc: The name of the UI being created. Can not included spaces or special punctuation (used in CSS class names).

params.name: $background-color
params.doc: The background color.

params.name: $selection-background-color
params.doc: The background color for a selection.

params.name: $selection-opacity
params.doc: The opacity for a selection.

params.name: $day-border-width
params.doc: The border width for the day cells.

params.name: $day-border-color
params.doc: The border color for the day cells.

params.name: $day-border-style
params.doc: The border style for the day cells.

params.name: $day-number-padding
params.doc: The padding for the day number.

params.name: $day-number-text-align
params.doc: The horizontal alignment for the day number.

params.name: $day-number-font-size
params.doc: The font size for the day number.

params.name: $day-number-font-family
params.doc: The font family for the day number.

params.name: $day-number-color
params.doc: The color for the day number.

params.name: $day-background-color
params.doc: The background color for day cells.

params.name: $day-number-outside-color
params.doc: The color for the day number when the day is outside the current month range. This style is only applied when using the month view.

params.name: $day-outside-background-color
params.doc: The background color for day cells when the day is outside the current month range. This style is only applied when using the month view.

params.name: $day-number-weekend-color
params.doc: The color for the day number when the day is a weekend.

params.name: $day-weekend-background-color
params.doc: The background color for day cells when the day is a weekend.

params.name: $day-vertical-align
params.doc: The vertical alignment for the day number.

params.name: $overflow-color
params.doc: The color for the "show more" text when a cell overflows.

params.name: $overflow-font-size
params.doc: The font size for the "show more" text when a cell overflows.

params.name: $overflow-font-family
params.doc: The font family for the "show more" text when a cell overflows.

members.short_doc: Creates a visual theme for the calendar weeks view. ...
